general.name: NetLogix - CW Control URL in UDF [WIN]
general.description: Use this Component to place a link to control a device from ConnectWise Control (Screen Connect) into a UDF on the device. You will require the details from an active ConnectWise Control subscription. Thanks to RisolvIT.

variable.name: usrUDF
variable.description: Which UDF number to place the link into. Numbers 1-30 accepted.

variable.name: usrCCInstance
variable.description: Get this from Add/Remove Programs or Services.msc. It will be listed as ScreenConnect Client (xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx)
